forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Slight chance of an afternoon shower. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clouds and some sun this morning with more clouds for this afternoon. Slight chance of an afternoon shower. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 58F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 13C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 55F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 56F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High around 55F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 56F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
